6saG5SNy7YI.title: Microsoft Copilot,  The Truth Behind the Hype!
6saG5SNy7YI.author: Andy Malone MVP
6saG5SNy7YI.description:
In this short video I’ll discuss a recent article by tech reporter, Mary Jo Foley on what truly lies behind the launch of Microsoft 365 Copilot AI feature. With Microsoft in marketing overdrive, the reality is turning out to be far more disappointing than first anticipated. Delays, pricing and availability issues are causing frustration not simply customers, but also the technical community who have been unable to verify Microsoft’s claims that this amazing product will change our world. So in this short 10 min video I’ll explain exactly what the issues are and the critical top 10 facts that you need to know before spending any money.

For more on me visit Andymalone.org

Support me on Patreon Patreon.com/AndyMaloneMVP

Mary Jo Foley's original article. https://www.directionsonmicrosoft.com/blog/ten-things-you-need-to-know-before-buying-microsoft-365-copilot/
